books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas investigates when an actress drowns at the opening party for a movie based on one of her cases; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: CELEBRITY IN DEATH

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: Volume 3 of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Kim Harrison
books.description: The witch Rachel Morgan faces a human hate group that is trying to create its own demons; Book 10 of the Hollows series.
books.name: A PERFECT BLOOD

books.author: by Vince Flynn
books.description: Mitch Rapp, a C.I.A. super-agent hunting down perpetrators of the Pan Am Lockerbie bombing, finds himself caught in a dangerous trap.
books.name: KILL SHOT

books.author: by William Landay
books.description: An assistant district attorney’s life is shaken when his 14-year-old son is accused of murder.
books.name: DEFENDING JACOB

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Peter Knight pursues a murderer who is trying to destroy the London Olympics.
books.name: PRIVATE GAMES

books.author: by Barbara Freethy
books.description: An entrepreneur must deal with his dotty grandfather, the sudden death of his ex-wife and the appearance of a beautiful redhead.
books.name: THE SWEETEST THING

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Sophie Kinsella
books.description: A frazzled bride-to-be creates havoc when she appropriates a cellphone she found in the trash.
books.name: I'VE GOT YOUR NUMBER

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In Volume 2 of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A Marine returning home sets out to track down the woman whose photo he found in Iraq.
books.name: THE LUCKY ONE

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the 40-year-old disappearance of a Swedish heiress.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Susan Wilson
books.description: A businessman who has lost his job, family and home adopts a former fighting pit bull from a shelter, to the benefit of both.
books.name: ONE GOOD DOG

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: A woman asks the Boston detective D.D. Warren to prevent her being murdered in four days’ time.
books.name: CATCH ME

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.
